fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Solvency II, Insurance Distribution Directive, Data Protection, European System of Financial Supervision review, Network and Information Security Directive, Green Paper on Retail Financial Services.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Lloyd's is a member of: 
Insurance Europe 
Reinsurance Advisory Board (RAB)
position: Head of Government Policy and Affairs
goals__remit: Lloyd's provides a specialist insurance and reinsurance market based in London. Its legal form is recognised by the EU Insurance and Reinsurance Directives. Its membership comprises of corporate and individual members, each of whom accepts insurance risk on their own account via their membership of Lloyd's underwriting syndicates. Lloyd's is authorised to write insurance from all EU Member States and provides reinsurance to more than 200 countries and territories worldwide.
